articles.description: Detectives desperate to locate a 12-year-old, seen abused online, found a surprising lead.

articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer's decision to abandon plans to delay 30 council elections after a legal challenge from Reform UK dominates Tuesday's papers.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: 'Farage forces elections U-turn' and 'Tributes to Godfather Star'

articles.description: Thousands of NHS workers were pursued by debt collectors after salary overpayments, the BBC finds.
articles.title: Bailiffs used to pursue NHS staff over pay errors

articles.title: Facing a demographic catastrophe, Ukraine is paying for troops to freeze their sperm

articles.description: Minnesota's Bureau of Criminal Apprehension says the FBI will not hand over any evidence it has gathered.
articles.title: FBI won't co-operate into Alex Pretti's death investigation, state officials say

articles.description: The Oscar-winner died "peacefully" at his home in Middleburg, Virginia on Sunday, his family says.
articles.title: Actor Robert Duvall, who starred in The Godfather, dies aged 95

articles.description: Thirty councils across England now have to organise local elections after the government abandoned plans to delay.
